task.title: How to Sum Up Numbers
task.shortdesc: This list of steps will show you how to use the sum up feature in the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully sum up numbers you should understand the concept of addition.
taskbody.result: The result of the numbers that were added together will be shown.
taskbody.example: You want to sum up the numbers 3 and 5. The equation will appear as 3 + 5 = 8. Enter the number 3. Then, press the plus (+) symbol. Enter the number 5. Choose the equality (=) symbol. The result appears on the screen.
